servinfo.title: Surge – Engine power variation under steady throttle or cruise. Feels like vehicle speeds up and down with no change in accelerator pedal
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection and Engine Basic Inspection .

condition.ptxt: Surge – Engine power variation under steady throttle or cruise. Feels like vehicle speeds up and down with no change in accelerator pedal

ps.ptxt: Leaky or loosely connected high-tension cord (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine)

ps.ptxt: Faulty spark plug (excess carbon deposits, improper gap, burned electrodes, etc.)
Kinky or damaged fuel hose and lines

ptxt.intxref: Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection
Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection
